pages.title: Smooth Clam
pages.text: Tridacna derasa, the southern giant clam or smooth giant clam, is a species of extremely large marine clam in the family Cardiidae.

pages.title: Smooth Clam
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
